attributes.action: Should England be an independent country?
attributes.additional_details:
Why weren't England, Wales or Northern Ireland given a choice as they were in Scotland to determine the fate of our great nation?

We therefore demand the right for a referendum to determine the future of England's relationship wih the rest of the union.

Then if England does become an independent nation as a result of this, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland can blame each other instead of England for all their woes.

rejection.details:
Please see:

Petition Title: Home rule for England

Created by: Mr Robert Cooley

Closing: 06/01/2015
